story.author: Pamphila Brandybuck
story.headline: BREAKING - Apple to Launch Furniture Line
story.subheading: The tech giant is expanding in a new domain and it could be a game changer!

article.p: In a statement released this morning, Apple has announced it will be launching a smart furniture line.
The release is expected to happen during the Apple "The world of tomorrow, today" event, set to happen next week in Las Vegas.
Apple fans are humming with excitement at the news.

'I am so looking forward to seeing the amazing products they launch. They have always had a different, visionary view on the world. Their furniture will definitely be both beautiful and practical.', says Timothy Gigliotti, a student at School of Design, De Montfort University, UK. 'And yes, I will definitely buy at least one of their products!'
Stay tuned next week, as we will be announcing and reviewing the new Apple furniture line!
